query.mdx: SELECT NON EMPTY Order(Hierarchize(Crossjoin([Owners].[Owner].[Owner].Members, [Fields].[Field].[Field].Members)), [Measures].[DirectMemory.SUM], DESC) ON ROWS, NON EMPTY {[Measures].[DirectMemory.SUM], [Measures].[DirectMemory.Ratio], [Measures].[VectorBlock.Length], [Measures].[VectorBlock.RefCount]} ON COLUMNS FROM [MemoryCube] CELL PROPERTIES VALUE, FORMATTED_VALUE, BACK_COLOR, FORE_COLOR, FONT_FLAGS
